text:
View this post on Instagram
Adorable together 😍😍😍❤️❤️👌👌💗💘💖 #ranveersingh #deepikapadukone #DeepVeerKiShaadi. Security head Yasin who was once the personal body guard of #shahrukhkhan makes sure the files is clear and even his bodyguards are asked to move out so we get good pics. Thank you as love getting a clean shot like this and we don't like unnecessary people around trying to photo bomb. @viralbhayani
A post shared by Viral Bhayani (@viralbhayani) on Nov 19, 2018 at 9:18pm PST
title: 'Bhabhi Mat Bulao Na', Deepika Padukone Blushes As She Requests Paparazzi To Not Call Her That!
description: At Ranveer Singh-Deepika Padukone’s second reception in Mumbai, she finally requested the paparazzi to not call her bhabhi. “Bhabhi mat bulao na”, she said with a smiling face, reminding us of the infamous “Aunty mat kaho na” line from classic TV show Hum Paanch.
